Sentencas: In general, La1-xSrxMnO3 (LSM) has been commonly used as a cathode for the commercial high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), but it is better to develop a cathode with higher and longer performance at high temperature (>900 degrees C).
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In this regard, Fe-based mixed ionic electronic conductors can be considered as one of the potential candidates for the replacement of LSM in terms of excellent catalytic activity.
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, they suffer from performance degradation due to the coarsening of particles during high-temperature fabrication and operation.
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Herein, Ca- and Ni-doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-delta (PBF) is studied, where Ca doping on Ba improves the electronic/ionic conductivity and Ni doping on Fe further enhances the thermal stability.
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The optimal composition of Pr0.5Ba0.3Ca0.2Fe0.7Ni0.3O3-delta (PBCFNi30) cathode shows a very low cathodic polarization resistance of 0.061 Omega cm(2) with a small degradation rate of 0.086 x 10(-3) Omega cm(2)/h
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: at 850 degrees C. Therefore, PBCFNi30 can be considered as a promising cathode for commercial high-temperature SOFC.
Titulo: Ca- and Ni-Doped Pr0.5Ba0.5FeO3-δ as a Highly Active and Robust Cathode for High-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
